#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>
#define mod 1000000007
using namespace std;
int main()
{   std:ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    int t;
    long long n,k,m,cur,ans=0;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
    	ans=0;
    	cin>>n>>k>>m;
    	cur=n;
    	while(1)
    	{
    		if((double)cur*(double)k>(double)m) break;
    		cur=cur*k;
    		ans++;
    	}
    	printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
	return 0;
}
